backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing access-controlled user profiles, slot settings, pricing rules, and slot blocking with admin-only mutations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a frontend admin login update to related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of all frontend files describing routing, auth, booking flows, admin tools, and UI components.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme variables and base styles for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the root React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the app router, routes, and providers including admin-protected routes and global theming.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminBooki: Admin calendar component showing daily slot status with booking and block state derived from queries.
frontend/src/components/admin/BlockSlots: Dialog component allowing admins to block or unblock individual slots with reason input and mutations.
frontend/src/components/admin/EarningsTr: Displays daily and weekly earnings based on a selected date using query hooks and date picker UI.
frontend/src/components/admin/PricingRul: Provides a form to view and update pricing rules with validation and backend syncing.
frontend/src/components/admin/SlotSettin: Form for configuring opening hours and slot duration with validation and update mutations.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessRestr: Shows an access denied screen for non-admin users with navigation back to booking.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Handles customer login/logout via Internet Identity with status indicators.
frontend/src/components/auth/RequireAdmi: Guards admin routes by enforcing authentication, admin checks, and profile setup.
frontend/src/components/customer/Availab: Renders available time slots with formatted times, prices, and slot selection.
frontend/src/components/customer/Booking: Form component that collects user details, validates authentication, and submits a booking using backend mutations.
Displays a read‑only summary of booking details including date, time, sport, and price.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout providing header, navigation, footer, and routing outlet with authentication-aware navigation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity and refreshes dependent queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for Internet Identity login, identity management, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for interacting with backend features like user profiles, admin checks, and ownership actions.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup plus dark-mode themed CSS variables for the app’s visual style.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point initializing React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Renders the admin dashboard with tabs for calendar management, slot settings, pricing rules, and earnings tracking.
Handles admin authentication, ownership claiming, and redirects based on admin status.
frontend/src/pages/customer/BookingConfi: Displays booking confirmation details, including date, time, and booking ID, with error handling for missing bookings.
frontend/src/pages/customer/CustomerBook: Lets users select a date, view available slots, and proceed with booking using pricing rules.
frontend/src/pages/customer/PaymentPlace: Shows a placeholder payment screen and allows users to continue to booking confirmation.
frontend/src/pages/customer/ReceiptLooku: Provides a form for users to enter a booking ID and navigate to its confirmation page.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, custom colors, fonts, animations, and including typography, container queries, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the full‑stack app goals, architecture, issues, and existing implemented features for SportsVilla NXT GEN turf management.
